Actions.Name: Execute desired workflow in your team to evaluate image or text content
Actions.Description:
A job Id will be returned for the Image or Text content posted on this endpoint.
Once the content is evaluated against the Workflow provided, a review will be created or ignored based on the workflow expression.

Actions.Name: Create Reviews for Reviewers in your moderation team
Actions.Description: The reviews created would show up for Reviewers on your team. As Reviewers complete reviewing, results of the Review would be POSTED (i.e. HTTP POST) on the specified CallBackEndpoint.

Actions.Name: Detect Language of a given text input content
Actions.Description: This operation will detect the language of given input content. Returns the ISO 639-3 code for the predominant language comprising the submitted text. Over 110 languages supported.

Actions.Name: Check if an image contains racy or adult content
Actions.Description: Returns probabilities of an image containing racy or adult content.

Actions.Name: Find faces in an image content
Match an image against one of your custom image lists
Actions.Description:
Fuzzily match an image against one of your custom Image Lists. You can create and manage your custom image lists using this API.
Returns ID and tags of matching image.

Note: Refresh Index must be run on the corresponding Image List before additions and removals are reflected in the response.

Actions.Name: Return any text found in an image for the specified language
Actions.Description: Returns any text found in the image for the language specified. If no language is specified in input then the detection defaults to English.

Actions.Name: Detect profanity and match against custom and shared block lists
Actions.Description: Detects profanity in more than 100 languages and match against custom and shared block lists.
